attributes.action: change the name of "Easter" in the United Kingdon to "Zombie Jesus Day"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that Gordon Brown, our so noble and Scottish Prime Minister, changes the name of our so over-exaggerated and most materialised holiday, "Easter", to "Zombie Jesus Day", a compulsory celebration for, lets face it, the fast majority of the UK population who are not religious or simply do not lack a sense of humour. On Zombie Jesus Day, it will be requested that these people wish everyone they meet a "Happy Zombie Jesus Day!" as they walk by, in the spirit of good will, happiness and patriotism

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
